welcome: Welcome to Pals! Let's connect you with someone. We just have a couple questions.
whatsYourName: What would you like to be called?
seenByYourPal: This will be what your Pal sees.
whatLanguages: Besides English, do you speak any other languages?
Do you speak any other languages besides English?
cantHelpYou: Sorry, we can't connect you right now.
